text: give them a meta rel nofollow and it will not be searchable
you can use `|replace(' href=', ' aria-label href=')`
I try to avoid placing HubSpot forms above the fold on desktop at all costs. I general will use the embed to lazyload it using objectObserver

That’s a great idea <@U38EZFVFE>!!!

I’ve been creating custom form modules just to add mobile and desktop min height fields. I may take the lazyload approach with a slight tweak since so many LPs have a form in the hero
